select c.carport_area carportArea ,count(c.carport_area) allSubarea,ifnull(sum(c.carport_carnumber!=''),0)subarEaemploy,ifnull(sum(c.carport_carnumber=''),0)subarLeisure from t_carport as c GROUP BY c.carport_area
